stem: In a patient who is taking methotrexate for rheumatoid arthritis, which of the following medications should be avoided?
disc: Both Methotrexate and Trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole (TMP-SMX) are inhibitors of folate metabolism and can result in bone marrow suppression. TMP-SMX can also reduce the renal excretion of methotrexate causing substantial toxic effects.
